Installation¶

Get the source code¶

Clone the last version of the toolbox from the git repository:

git clone https://github.com/obidam/pcm.git

Dependencies¶

The PCM Matlab toolbox relies on the Netlab Neural Network Software, version 3.3. It is included in the PCM Matlab toolbox under the lib folder, so you don’t have to install it.

Install on the Matlab path¶

Simply ensure that you have the PCM Matlab toolbox (src) and its dependencies (lib) folders on your Matlab path ! This can simply be done by adding the following lines to your startup file:

addpath(fullfile('pcm','matlab','src'));
addpath(fullfile('pcm','matlab','lib','netlab3_3'));
